divs: sighting details well, i was working the over nite in a retirement living assistance building located in trenton n. j. i was on tour \ building walk throughs checking and securing the buidling. i work in contract security, i happen to be a very observant when it comes to details and when something is out of place and does'nt seem right. so around midnight ( no pun intended ) give or take ten mintues it was the just the start of my shift, up on the 12th floor( top floor) i noticed on the south corridor the tentant from apt #1201 miss green who stared out the window talking bout aliens,saucers and a home base under the delaware river as i was approaching her, she said "look at the moon, there's more than one look look look, there are aliens here". she was in the tone of imaginative spirit and so convienced that they simply exist, cause after i get back to post i noticed papers scattered over my console with drawlings and notes, and some un clear handwriting stating aliens are here and their home base is there located along with directional arrows telling me where the aliens are. this experience feels different cause under the nature of the situation i feel that though i didn't see facts or evidence but only the fact is that i do believe in aliens, i dont beleive in them i beleive they exist, this experience just helps prove that. i dont care what others think and judgements, their boring judegments , u want proof just to write this , was very difficult,i even find that funny on how many distractions i encountered during writing this. werid , strange what else is new... pay attention, staty alert cause god forbid if any day dreams, or dreams attention attention attention pay atention ation pay attention, just notice how often u have to pay attention. poteintial
